recode.name: recode
recode.title: Recode
recode.command.require_creative_mode: You must be in creative mode to use this command!
recode.command.require_dev_mode: You must be in dev mode to use this command!
recode.state.panicked: Possible malicious plot detected. You have been sent to spawn.

config.recode.title: Recode
config.recode.subcategory.screen_world_r: Features related to rendering a world
config.recode.option.chestReplacement.to: Render all chests as a barrel
Maximum distance for signs to render
config.recode.option.plotInfoOverlay.too: Displays your current DiamondFire location on the screen
config.recode.subcategory.screen_title_s: Options related to the Minecraft title screen
config.recode.subcategory.screen_code.to: Options that can help render information while coding
config.recode.option.dfButton.tooltip: Adds a button in the title screen to join DiamondFire
config.recode.option.dfNodeButtons.toolt: Adds node specific buttons in the title screen to join DiamondFire
config.recode.option.debugMode.tooltip: Enables a debug mode for developers. Only if you know what you're doing
config.recode.option.incomingReportSound: Selects the sound to play upon receiving an incoming report
config.recode.option.itemApi.tooltip: Used for sending items from third party programs
config.recode.option.variableScopeView.t: Shows the variable scope under the item name
Highlights and previews expression syntax,
like percent codes and MiniMessage
config.recode.option.showCodeblockDescri: Shows a description of the currently opened code block
config.recode.option.previewHeadSkins.to: Shows a preview of the skin from a player head when hovering over one
config.recode.option.templatePeeking.too:
Preview a code template without the
 need of having to place it down
(NOTE: currently not working)
config.recode.option.cpuOnScreen.tooltip:
Display the LagSlayer CPU bar on the screen
directly instead of the action bar
config.recode.subcategory.commands_autom:
Will set a conversation with someone when
doing /msg <player>, any message sent in chat
will automatically be sent to that person only
config.recode.option.automsg_timeout.too:
Enable the timeout feature, ending
automatically a conversation if it
is inactive for too long
config.recode.option.automsg_timeoutNumb:
The time it takes for an inactive
conversation to end
config.recode.subcategory.automation_tim:
Automatically runs /time upon
entering dev or build mode
config.recode.option.autowand.tooltip:
Automatically runs //wand upon
entering build mode
config.recode.option.autoRC.tooltip:
Automatically runs /rc upon
entering dev mode
config.recode.option.autonightvis.toolti:
Automatically enables Night Vision
upon entering dev or build mode
config.recode.option.autolagslayer.toolt:
Automatically display CPU usage upon
joining one of your plots
config.recode.option.autoClickEditMsgs.t:
Automatically click messages like
the ones that appear when you
shift l-click a text
config.recode.option.dfCommands.tooltip: Enables the commands that work only in DiamondFire
config.recode.option.errorSound.tooltip: Plays a sound when the mod sends error messages
config.recode.subcategory.commands_heads: Settings that apply to the /heads command
config.recode.option.headMenuMaxRender.t: Amount of heads to display in the /heads menu
Replaces the color picker with
DiamondFire's built-in command
config.recode.subcategory.keybinds_fligh:
Values used for the Flight Speed keybinds found
in the "Options -> Controls -> Recode" menu
config.recode.option.fsNormal.tooltip: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Normal" keybind
config.recode.option.fsMed.tooltip: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Medium" keybind
config.recode.option.fsFast.tooltip: Flight speed used for the "Flight Speed Fast" keybind
config.recode.option.highlight.tooltip:
Highlights the text below in chat if it gets mentioned
in a chat message sent by a player
config.recode.option.highlightIgnoreSend:
Ignores the sender of the
chat message for highlighting
config.recode.option.highlightMatcher.to:
Text to highlight.
{name} is replaced with your username
config.recode.option.highlightPrefix.too:
The text to put in front of the
highlighted text. Supports (hex) color codes
config.recode.subcategory.highlight_soun:
Sound settings for when a
text highlight is triggered
config.recode.option.highlightSound.tool:
Sound to play when a text highlight
is triggered. Select "None" to disable
config.recode.option.highlightOwnSenderS:
Plays a sound if you are the message sender. Requires:
- A sound to be selected
- The message sender to be ignored
config.recode.option.hideJoinLeaveMessag:
Hides messages of players joining
or leaving the current node
config.recode.option.hideVarScopeMessage: Hides messages about changing variable scopes
Merges multiple messages into one
if they're the same
Hides the scoreboard when the F3 menu is active
config.recode.subcategory.hiding_regex.t: Hides all messages that match a custom regex
config.recode.option.hideMsgRegex.toolti: Regex the message has to match
config.recode.subcategory.hiding_staff.t:
Hiding features exclusive
for DiamondFire staff members
config.recode.option.hideSessionSpy.tool: Hides session spy messages for experts
config.recode.option.hideMutedChat.toolt:
Hides chat messages from
muted players for moderators
config.recode.option.destroyItemReset.to:
Resets your inventory to the specified
set of items after shift clicking the
destroy item slot while in dev mode
Allows you to change a number variable
simply by scrolling
config.recode.option.quicknumSound.toolt: Plays a sound when changing the number
config.recode.option.quicknumPrimaryAmou: Change how much a scroll changes the number
config.recode.option.quicknumSecondaryAm: Change how much a scroll changes the number (When holding CTRL)
config.recode.option.quicknumTertiaryAmo: Change how much a scroll changes the number (When holding SHIFT)
config.recode.option.chestToolTip.toolti: Display chest params when you are in dev
config.recode.option.chestToolTipType.to:
Choose between regular Minecraft tooltip style 
or raw text in the top left corner
config.recode.option.streamerDescription:
§9§l§nStreamer Mode

§7Below are options to help make the stream experience better
config.recode.option.streamer.tooltip:
Enable Streamer Mode.
Turning this option off will make
all other options no longer work
config.recode.subcategory.streamer_strea:
The individual configurable
parts of the Streamer Mode
Automatically runs "/adminv off" silently
when you join a node
config.recode.option.streamerAutoChatLoc:
Automatically runs "/chat local" silently
when you join a node or join a plot
config.recode.option.streamerSpies.toolt:
Hides spy (*) messages, including
session spy, muted spy, and DM spy
config.recode.option.streamerHidePlotAds: Hides plot ads and blocks it's sound
config.recode.option.streamerHidePlotBoo: Hides plot boosts and blocks it's sound
config.recode.option.streamerHideBuycraf: Hides the BuycraftX plugin update message
config.recode.option.streamerHideSupport:
Blocks all support messages and sounds, including:
- Support broadcast
- Support queue
- Support question
- Support answer
config.recode.option.streamerHideModerat:
Blocks all moderation messages and sounds, including:
- Mod broadcast
- Incoming report
- Silent punishment
- Alt scanner
- AntiX alerts
- Teleport
- Join fails
config.recode.option.streamerHideAdmin.t:
Blocks all admin messages and sounds, including:
- Admin broadcast
config.recode.subcategory.streamer_strea: Option to add your own regex to hide additional messages
config.recode.option.streamerHideRegexEn: Enable this feature. Effective only if streamer mode is on
config.recode.option.streamerHideRegex.t: Regex the message has to fully match
config.recode.option.discordRPCShowSessi: Shows active support sessions in the presence
config.recode.option.discordRPCSpawnDeta: Text shown on the first row of the presence
config.recode.option.discordRPCSpawnStat: Text shown on the second row of the presence
config.recode.subcategory.discordRPC_dis: Settings applied when in a plot
config.recode.option.discordRPCPlotDetai: Text shown on the first row of the presence
config.recode.option.discordRPCPlotState: Text shown on the second row of the presence
config.recode.option.discordRPCShowPlotM: Shows what mode you are currently in
config.recode.subcategory.discordRPC_dis: Settings related to the elapsed section on the presence
config.recode.option.discordRPCShowElaps: Shows an elapsed section in the presence
config.recode.option.discordActivityTime: The property the elapsed timestamp should be based on
config.recode.option.sidechat_width.tool:
The width to be used by the second chat.
If set to 0, the width will be calculated from the
lower of main chat width & window space remaining.
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_cust: Filter that matches text with a pattern defined by you
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_mess: Filter that matches text that comes from the /msg command
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_supp: Filter that matches text that comes from Support Chat
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_sess: Filter that matches text that comes from Expert Session Spy
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_mod_: Filter that matches text that comes from Mod Chat
config.recode.subcategory.sidedchat_admi: Filter that matches text that comes from Admin Chat
config.recode.option.custom_chat.side.to: Side for chat matching the Custom Chat filter
config.recode.option.custom_filter.toolt:
Messages containing these phrases are filtered
into the 'Custom' Chat Side.
Seperate phrases with commas
config.recode.option.messages.side.toolt: Side for chat matching the /msg filter
config.recode.option.support_chat.side.t: Side for chat matching the Support Chat filter
config.recode.option.session_chat.side.t: Side for chat matching the Session Spy filter
config.recode.option.mod_chat.side.toolt: Side for chat matching the Mod Chat filter
config.recode.option.admin_chat.side.too: Side for chat matching the Admin Chat filter
config.recode.option.custom_chat.sound.t: Sound for chat matching the Custom Chat filter
config.recode.option.messages.sound.tool: Sound for chat matching the /msg filter
Sound for chat matching the Support Chat filter
Sound for chat matching the Session Spy filter
config.recode.option.mod_chat.sound.tool: Sound for chat matching the Mod Chat filter
config.recode.option.admin_chat.sound.to: Sound for chat matching the Admin Chat filter
multiplayer.recode.request_timeout.toast: Check the latest log for more info.
multiplayer.recode.unofficial_address.to: The server address you used to connect to DiamondFire is unofficially hosted by a third party. For security reasons, we have replaced it with the official address.
